Html:
I have a couple of reports I am trying to create that are very large (1000 pages or more) and have a lot of small but simple tables (up to several per page).  The server I'm using is ZendCE for Windows and I'm hitting the 32 bit memory limit for windows applications (NOTE: *not* the php.ini limit) .  I can't find any pointers in the documentation for reducing the memory.

Are there any pointers?
